1. Please choose same factor with factor A of middle explosive, when explosion is low explosive. when we blast stiff rock using low explosive, charge should be raised to 1.2~1.5 times according above formula. \n 2. When soil is nonhomogeneous, the value of factor A chooses factor of most stiff soil. \n 3. When stiff rock has some slot in it, the value of factor A should be decrease to half and the most suitable factor should be decided by normal loading blasting test.
1. The value of factor is suitable to middle explosive, low explosive is used only as inner charge. The loading should raise to 50%, when we execute outer explosive. \n 2. The factor should decrease to half when stiff material has some slit in it.
